titles.title: Providing for the adoption of the resolution (H. Res. 578) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to apply certain laws to the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-851, by Mr. Moakley.
Rule provides for consideration of H. Res. 578. Upon the adoption of this resolution, H. Res. 578 shall be considered to be also adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 249.

action.text: Mr. Moakley moved to consider the resolution.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 348 - 3 (Roll no. 505).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Introduced. Provides for the adoption of H. Res. 578 (application of certain laws to the House of Representatives).
